content:
Hey folks,

I've been using rust-analyzer w/ the nvim-lsp for a little while, and its been pretty great. However a few days ago I bumped up a dependency on one of the crates i've been building I noticed that diagnostics were not being omitted, even with the most egregious of mistakes! On other projects on my machine, diagnostics seem to be working. some examples below:

working: https://asciinema.org/a/fAqy1FVh82MT5SUUjaLMiUwko

broken, on my little toy: https://asciinema.org/a/hNJ4Phu6APZTBciFB8wp4yHXo

I'd like to dig down a little and figure this out. has anyone done debug work w/ neovim-lsp and rust-analyzer and would have some tips on where to start?

fwiw, rust-analyzer version: rust-analyzer 2021-04-19-95-g07fb65abb

thanks,
jimmy
this is for hacking on rustc itself
